text: Okhulekha (talaka) nikhabili , Mana hao ni okhwikhala khubulayi nohomba okhulekhana khubulayi, Neshimufuchililwa okhubukula shiosi shiosi eshia mwahelesia Abakhasi benyu, halali boosi babili nibaria mbu shibalanyala okhuliinda olwakho lwa Nyasaye tawe, kho nimuria mbu shibalaliinda olwakho lwa Nyasaye tawe hawo obutulani bubulao nikali mbu omukhasi alenunula. Etso nitsio tsinzakho tsia Nyasaye kho mulatsiruma tawe. Nebalia baruma tsinzakho tsia Nyasaye abo nibo abamabii
